content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. Use the line graph to answer the following questions. A. Identify the percentage of baby boomers who identified as Independents in 2014. B. Describe a trend in the data. C. Explain how that trend might affect political campaigns in the future. D. Explain how political parties should adapt based on the data shown in the line graph.

topic.text: 5.4: How and Why Political Parties Change and Adapt
